title: Punishment for Murder
explanation: Defines the punishment for committing murder, which includes death or imprisonment for life, and liability to fine.

title: Organised Crime
explanation: New provision defining organised crime and prescribing penalties for members of organised crime syndicates.

title: Sexual Intercourse by Deceitful Means
explanation: Criminalises sexual intercourse obtained by employing deceitful means, such as false promise of employment or promotion, or marrying after suppressing identity.

title: Theft
explanation: Defines the offence of theft as moving any movable property out of the possession of any person without that person's consent.

title: Criminal Breach of Trust
explanation: Punishment for criminal breach of trust by public servants, bankers, merchants, or agents.
